name: Tales of Rem
description:
Tales of Rem is a 3D platformer prototype developed in one week as a submission for the Godot Wild Jam 2023!

Play as Rem, a little wizard that can travel through the world of dreams. Their mission is to chase down the  Dremlin,  a mischievous creature that leaves blobs of nightmarish waste wherever they go. 

[ Controls ]

Mouse and Keyboard:

WASD to move

E to interact

Space to Jump

Controller:

West Button to interact

South Button to Jump
